author: adw
title: Top Contributor - Reliable revew
text:
I booked one night at The Montcalm London Marble Arch as an early Mother's Day treat - and I could not have been happier with my choice!
From arrival - the reception staff were impeccable - there was clearly a 'desire to please' and we were offered a glass of Prosecco whilst our room was given 'the finishing touches' (we turned up at 12.15pm so were expecting to be turned away until check in opened at 2pm but were in our room by 12.45!) Our room was on the Sixth floor and was exceptional - clean, spacious, fresh smelling with 'finishing touches' that (without wanting to spoil the surprise for other guests) were superb!
We then went off to spend the day shopping/eating and arrived back around 5pm to nip down to the SPA for a quick leg soak in the Jacuzzi - SO welcome after a day walking around on very tired legs!
I couldn't recommended this hotel more for a stay in London, the location, staff, rooms, service and 'extra touches' are not something you will find for the same exceptional value anywhere else in town. Book now!!!
